Statistical simulation using pmap()

  • Show All Code
  • Hide All Code
  • View Source
The purrr package is a powerful tool for functional programming. This post explores how the pmap() function can be used for statistical simulations.
Author

Max Rohde

Published

May 11, 2022

Code
# Load packages

theme_set(cowplot::theme_cowplot(font_size=14,

```{r}
# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(gganimate)

library(Hmisc)

library(palmerpenguins)

library(patchwork)
library(kableExtra)
library(glue)

# Set global ggplot theme
theme_set(cowplot::theme_cowplot(font_size=14,
                                 font_family = "Source Sans Pro"))
```
